short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic text summarizer in the Mongolian language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AI-Based Summarizer Extension is a powerful browser add-on designed to simplify and accelerate your reading experience by providing concise summaries of lengthy content in the Mongolian language. With this extension, you can quickly understand the main ideas of any web page, article, or text without spending extra time reading through it all
